caption.p: Response surface plots showing relative effect of two extraction parameters for (a) B. diffusa ( a i: yield and a ii: antioxidant activity); (b) R. emodi ( b i: yield and b ii: antioxidant activity); (c) N. nucifera ( c i: yield and c ii: antioxidant activity) and (d) C. nurvala ( d i: yield and d ii: antioxidant activity); but other parameters were kept at constant levels.
